name: Blue Cube
description:
Blue Cube Security is one of the UK’s largest independent IT and cyber security resellers. With a consultative approach, Blue Cube Security has been providing expertise to its customers in this space for over 17 years. 
The Blue Cube Security team is skilled and knowledgeable in the ever-evolving threat landscape. The team apply their expertise and Blue Cube Security’s methodology of ‘Intelligent Protection’ to help identify what, how and where to protect valuable assets.
